entities.name: ronald bilius weasley
entities.description: Ron Weasley is mentioned as the one who received Dumbledore's Deluminator in his will. He is described as someone whom Dumbledore liked and was fond of.

entities.name: albus percival wulfric brian dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned as the one who left his will. He is described as someone who liked Ron and was fond of him.

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as the one who received a pouch from Hagrid earlier in the story. He is also present when Scrimgeour reads Dumbledore's will aloud.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: Scrimgeour is mentioned as the one who reads Dumbledore's will aloud. He seems to be listening to it, but also appears to be distracted.

entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is mentioned as the one who gave Harry a pouch earlier in the story.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left his Deluminator to Ron in his will. This is mentioned in the text as 'To Ronald Bilius Weasley, I leave my Deluminator...'
Dumbledore liked Ron, as mentioned by Hermione. This is also implied in the text when Dumbledore leaves his Deluminator to Ron.
